summary: This mod adds a dunmer follower, Vares Rarem, to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Description: 
This mod adds a Dunmer follower, Vares Rarem, to the game. He is quite adept with one-handed and two-handed weapons, as well as heavy armor. Vares Rarem traveled to Skyrim in order escape is families incessant mocking over his, minor \"problem\". In this character\'s inventory, you might find a few odds and ends that might prove new and quite usefull. 

Location: 
Vares Rarem can be found in the fine city of Whiterun nere Jorrvaskr. 

Hidden: 
If you seach Vares Rarem\'s belonings closely, you might discover an interesting piece of information


Included in this mod:

Vares Rarem (follower)
Journal (contains a little back story)
Confessions of a Dunmer Skooma-Eater
Armor and weapons with altered stats
Chest containing armor and weapons
...(other misc items)


-------------------------------------------------------------- 

*Please feel free to post any questions or suggestions and I will see what I can do
author: Ghostrunner24
